def.dt: :in addition She's a talented singer and also a fine actress. Thomas Edison is best known for inventing the lightbulb, but he also invented the phonograph. I don't think we should go out. Not only is it late, but it's also snowing.

:in a similar way He saw something and she also saw it. [=she saw it too] “I grew up in North Dakota.” “Really? I'm also from North Dakota.” [=I'm from North Dakota too] My neighbors were also at the show that night.
:a person who has taken part in an election or contest and did not win He was an also-ran in last year's mayoral race.
